sentences.sContent: Even babies soon become aware of the transience of human ties.
sentences.sContent_eng: Even babies soon become aware of the transience of human ties.
sentences.sCn: 连婴儿也会很快意识到人际关系的短暂无常。

sentences.sContent: "Ode on an Grecian Urn" shows the contrast between the permanence of art and the transience of human passion.
sentences.sContent_eng: "Ode on an Grecian Urn" shows the contrast between the permanence of art and the transience of human passion.
sentences.sCn: “希腊古瓮颂”展示了永恒的艺术与短暂的人类热情之间的对比。

words.tran: 瞬变现象；过往旅客；候鸟
